item.title: Solving SherlockCTF
item.description: SherlockCTF was a collaborative CTF organized by Sherlock and Secureum, for the top 32 participants in february's RACE event. Each participant submitted a CTF level, and for 7 days, the competition was opened. I managed to score 32 points.
